column5: I worked at Dogskin Lake for a few years. My last year was about 3 years ago. I meet alot of great people while I was there. I figured that since alot of them where from the states they might be checking things out here on WC. I've lost touch with alot of the people from the lodge and was checking to see if any of you guys stop in here at WC could give me an e-mail.[email protected] Fish ON!!
